title: 2 bodies, body part recovered in 2 districts
body: The police on Saturday recovered two bodies from rivers in Munshinganj while body part of an individual was recovered from Tongi Railway Bridge in Gazipur. The bodies of a man and a woman were recovered from the Meghna and Kajali rivers in Gazaria upazila of Munshiganj on Saturday at about 12:00pm, New Age correspondent in Munshiganj reported. Gazaria river police outpost in-charge Sharajit Kumar Ghosh said that the body of the woman was recovered from Dubar Char in Hossaindi Union while the body of the man was recovered from the Kajali River in Baushia Union. The identities of the two bodies have not been found yet, he said, adding that the police were working on to determine their identities. ‘Further legal procedures are under process, the cause of the death would be known after an investigation,’ added the police official. Local people said that they had spotted the woman’s body at about 12:00pm and later informed the police. Around the same time, some local children spotted another body with two legs tied with a rope. Meanwhile, the police recovered a leg of a body of an individual with the lower part of the ankle, wrapped inside a polythene bag at Turag River’s railway bridge at Tongi in Gazipur, New Age correspondent in the district reported. Tongi Railway police outpost in-charge Mohammad Ali Jinnah said that the body part was sent for autopsy. A general diary was filed and a drive was on going to recover the rest of the body parts.
